title: Social Media Management
introDescription: X8C's SMM team manages high-performing social media campaigns on prominent platforms, leveraging next-gen strategies for measurable results. We work as an extension of your project’s marketing team.
processDescription: The process of creating your marketing strategy will vary depending on your specific goals and needs, however these are some of the steps you can expect us to take:

processList.label: Setting Standards
processList.text: To ensure a smooth and successful campaign, it is important to align operation standards and deliverables. This includes establishing clear goals, outlining the scope of work, and determining the roles and responsibilities of all parties involved.

processList.label: Communications
processList.text: Effective communication is key to the success of any campaign. To facilitate this, we will create a Telegram chat group for real-time communication and campaign setup.

processList.label: Performance Audit
processList.text: The project lead will conduct regular social media audits to monitor the performance of your campaigns. This will involve taking snapshots of important metrics, such as engagement and conversion rates, to identify areas for improvement and make data-driven decisions about how to optimise your project’s social media strategy.

processList.label: Your Social Blueprints
processList.text: We will work with you to define a social media strategy tailored to your project’s business goals. This will involve identifying the right channels and platforms to target, crafting compelling content, and setting clear KPIs to measure success.

processList.label: The Takeover
processList.text: Our team will set up or take over your social media accounts. This includes creating and optimising profiles, developing a content calendar, and managing day-to-day operations such as posting, monitoring, and engaging with your project’s audience.

processList.label: Always up to Date
processList.text: To ensure that your campaigns are always running at their best, we will schedule weekly calls to plan content, discuss metrics, and make adjustments as needed. Additionally, we will send monthly reports to clients with metrics, engagement data, analytics, and supporting actions.
